Articles.Content:
I just had an idea that we can just make a waiting room before every update and discuss staff.

So we have only one thread and not 100+. So if you have to say something about the release date or the upcoming update today, say it here. Thanks

It's so simple that nobody thought about it before. Kudos to you sir

Edit: But to give a on-topic statement; You have to consider the time in Mexico to figure out the expected "time" of arrival. And since it's the middle of the night in Mexico, it's going to take some hours at least..

Edited December 17, 2013 by JSD
Why hasn't it been released yet. It's been the 17th for 4 hours!!!!!
10 hours here and i think i have to wait till tomorrow to test it
I hope i can play it when i come home from school. Been the 17th for 10 and a half hours. (Live in sweden, GMT +1)
GMT +8 here...

GMT +1 here

We have the same prob as the 0.22 launch,time like space is relative.

We know the date but we don't know an hour relative to us
I will be at home and ready to play at 1900 at the earliest, so I couldnt care less.
It will probably be released late tonight for us close to GMT, like it was the last time. Can't wait though
Currently at school and waiting ! Don't except release soon thought because they always release in late evening in my timezone

Is it out yet?

(I always wanted to do that)
GMT +10 here is Australia, feel sorry for the Kiwis they have it slightly worse than us.

Western America here, almost 2 am. Not going to stay up all night waiting, but it'd be pleasant to wake up to. All you out in the later time zones, don't stress it. Take the time to step outside or look out a window and think up what you're going to do with the coming update.
GMT+2 and i believe it will be released at about 23.00 local time (+8 hours ahead of Mexico)
I'm up since 2 AM (about 8 hours ago) here and won't go to sleep until .23 was released.

Meh. I will be at work. And since i will probably be pulling extra hours to cover for my colleague, i won't even return home today Dang it. Oh well, at least servers should be free when i finally get to download the game, and the process will be smooth and fast.
First thing i'm going to do make a ship that doesnt suck.... GMT + 13 here in NZ
It is 4 in the morning in Mexico ... I presume we will wait for a while...

11 am in Vienna, GMT +1

As long as it gets released I am fine...
There's that saying, "Never play on patch day". Thankfully it doesn't apply to KSP. The only problem will be server meltdowns

GMT +8 here...

GMT +10 here.

I win! Oh wait.

I would kerb my enthusiasm for 0.23 but it's not tweakable yet.
Off course more annoying is that the people who play on steam might get the release earlier then those that download from the site
HA! I'm in PST and I work nights! I win! Muahahahahaha! I'll be home at 5am playing .23!

It's 2 o'clock in the morning here (California). I'm only awake because I'm finishing a paper for finals. I have to say Squad picked the worst day to release .23! I can't concentrate on my paper and check for the update at the same time!!! I can't wait until I am done with the semester! From the second I walk out of my last final until next semester I am playing .23. Who needs family at christmas when you have kerbals? HAHA

I hope everyone has time to enjoy the update!

GMT +1

I'll highly likely not get to play it today.
